Love this game and I really enjoy playing the levels over to see if I can use fewer items or get the oil in faster. The jazzy music isn't usually my style but it is calming and doesn't rush me nervously. I played this before but newer levels aren't as fun for some reason. Can't remember but don't mind starting over to find out.
I like it

title.label: Can‚Äôt tap anything in the menu

content.label: After starting a game, if you back out to the menu, or restart the game you can‚Äôt select anything because tapping doesn‚Äôt work. Swiping works, but doesn‚Äôt do any good if you can‚Äôt tap.

I love this game so much I could play this game 
my whole life
developers have decided to kill the app. dont get

title.label: Can No Longer Tap to Select in Main Menu

content.label:
UPDATE: I found out that I was charged $1.99 to re-download the app despite the fact that I owned this app for years. AND IT STILL DOESN'T WORK.

Original Review: had to delete and reinstall the app - losing all progress - after the most recent update b/c I could only scroll left & right through the levels on the main menu screen. I could tap to select anything. Even after deleting & reinstalling... it automatically started me back at level 1 (after reinstalling), and I could play through the levels, but after exiting to the main menu, I again cannot tap to select *anything.* This renders the app useless.
Thank you for updating this for the modern phones, it looks a lot better now. hope you make Feed me oil 3.

I purchased this game 2 days ago and it won't open any of the levels unless I uninstall and reinstall it. Which means I have to start at level one again because it doesn't save levels after the app has been deleted. I tried emailing them with no response. I would love to get my money back for this piece of crap.
We finally got an update. Haven't even played it yet, since the update.  I've been waiting for this game to get support for 3 years almost, and we finally have it.

Only the first chapter works. After that you cannot select anything in the game. 

Refund requested.
THIS IS NOT FUN(‚òùÔ∏é ò–î ò)‚òùÔ∏é

This is one of the most amazing and interesting game that I have played. Probably better than even angry birds. Unfortunately, at some level I got stuck. Not sure of the level number as I can not see any level number but it is the level where first time I saw big magnet. My 25% of the screen has white patch and screen is completely non responsive. Tried to reinstall this and played (painfully) all levels to this one but got stuck again. Has anyone faced this and solved it? Kindly advise. Have also raised with developer but response is awaited. Thanks.

Fun game but I think development has stopped
There's a bug on iOS 10.0.2 where a big part of the screen goes blank and it's unplayable. Can't reset, can't quit, rebooting the phone didn't work so I have to uninstall

It was fun but I'd get to a certain level and quit the game. Twice now when I'd open the app again I'd be at the level I left but it was totally frozen. Nothing worked. I closed the app completely and opened it again. It was still frozen at the same spot. I ended up removing the app and starting all over. It did start me completely over. And then it froze again.
I have loved this game for quite some time, but recently it has been freezing on me. Turning off the phone doesn't even restart the app so I don't know what to do. I think it needs an update.
Liked the game until it froze on level 4 now I can't play anything even after restarting my phone waste of a dollar

title.label: Fun game, but app has permanently frozen

content.label: This game has many bugs and the app has frozen on me. I have restarted the app, restarted my phone, and upgraded phones and still can't get out of the frozen game. Not sure what to do at this point.

I think Feed Me Oil is a very fun game
because their are hints you can use for free,or you can do the level yourself.
Theirs easy,and hard levels.
Each level has a hint,so you can pass the level.
The best thing is... The music!
They play music in every level.
Theirs a lot of levels.I don't really know
How many their are.
When you get to the part more levels coming soon,you have to rate the app to keep going like I just did.
I would give it 5 stars if it had more levels.
Cool challenging app

This is a really fun and addicting puzzle game.. but at the end they try to charge you another dollar to play all of the levels again upside down.. Seriously? Also considering their lack of updates it's obvious they've completely given up on updating this game.. 

Their "new levels coming soon" has been there for years..

This would be a 5/5 game if it wasn't for these two things.. If neither of these two point bother you then by all means buy this game.
Very addicting but lots of bugs. Game freezes a lot annoying to have to restart all the time
Fun game, but it freezes permanently around the third world, so I've had to delete it twice now. Not worth it.

title.label: Hints don't even help at all

content.label: Don't get this app. Especially if you expect a lot of this game. Don't let the 5 stars fool you. This game is frustrating and the main problem is that the hints do not work. I wasted 6 hints on one level. All of them were on the spot that the hints told me to put everything and it did not work. Don't waste your money on this game.
Fun little puzzle game!  Stunningly cute artwork and soundtrack don't detract from gameplay.  In each and every level, the player builds an engineering marvel.  Would recommend for all ages.
